docs.lead_paragraph: DARRYL STRAWBERRY, the recovering drug user, cancer survivor and sometime baseball player, was back in the news this week for all the usual reasons. He was in trouble with the law. Mr. Strawberry's troubles came to the attention of a woman in Harlem named Thomasina, who found them of more than passing interest. How could she not? She has fought her own demons over the years, same as the women and men she lives with on East 121st Street, at a drug treatment residence run by Odyssey House.
docs.abstract: Clyde Haberman NYC column discusses reaction of residents at New York City drug treatment center Odyssey Home to latest addiction problems of former baseball player Darryl Strawberry (M)
